description.en:
Lured by the large sum of money offered for participating in a drug trial, I was presented a drug to drink, which turned me into a big-breasted beautiful girl. Not only that, but I was also lactating!

Overjoyed by her success, the female researcher Riko Ushiue went back to her lab to check the drug's formulation. Through bad timing, my best friend Ryou came in for the same drug trial...

(Source: DLsite) 

| Namespace | Tags |
| :- | :- |
| male | drugs, gender change, gender morph, sole male |
| female | breast expansion, breast feeding, defloration, lactation, milking, nakadashi, **rape** |
| other | full color, mosaic censorship |
description.ja:
多額の謝礼に釣られて治験のバイトを受けたオレは差し出された薬を飲み干して巨乳美少女になってしまった!その上、母乳まで出てしまう体質に。
大成功に喜ぶ女研究者牛上りこが成分検査をするために研究室奥に戻ったタイミングで、親友涼もこの治験バイトを受けようと訪問してきて…

biography.en:
Doujin circle focused on producing TS (Genderswap) works.

**Native name**: あむぁいおかし製作所 

**Alt. names**:
Amulai Okashi Seisakusho
Amulai Sweets Factory
Amulai

**Members**:
Scenario Writers
* [Totoyasu](https://mangadex.org/author/919e78f2-7448-4ffa-90fa-87a866310a73)
